text: Daniki maryam kumarudu isa (esu): "O allah! Ma prabhu! Akasam nundi aharanto nindina oka pallanni ma koraku avatarimpajeyi (dimpu); adi maku modativani nundi civarivani varaku pandugaga undali; adi ni tarapu nundi oka sucanaga undali. Maku aharanni prasadincu. Nive atyuttamamaina upadhi pradatavu!" Ani prarthincadu
